title: My Out-of-Wedlock Son is Unhappy
description:
Ben never married the mother of his first son and would like advice on how to make him more “comfortable” when he visits Ben's new wife and 5-month-old. - Dr. Laura: "Help your son express himself and deal with his real feelings."

How have you seen kids react to remarriage and the birth of new children after divorce? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

YouTube.com/DrLaura
